definition[0]: firmly fastened to a particular position
example[0]: a mirror fixed to the bathroom wall
definition[1]: fixed times, amounts, meanings etc cannot be changed
example[1]: The classes begin and end at fixed times.
example[3]: My contract was for a fixed term of five years.
definition[2]: a fixed smile, expression etc does not show any emotion or does not show how someone really feels
example[5]: Consumers spend a fixed amount on books regardless of price changes.
example[6]: The option of converting gold at a fixed price had been cancelled.
